programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: Angela, an American tour guide in Rome, agrees to teach a culture-shocked businessman named Oliver about the heart of Rome at Christmas.

programme.desc: The girls help a pregnant teen and play host to Blanche's visiting pen pal.

programme.desc: Frasier is chagrined when his father handily and repeatedly beats him at chess.

programme.desc: Brock asks Reba to help plan his father's funeral after he dies on a golf course and Barbra Jean wants the funeral a grand event and play the bereaved woman.

programme.desc: Since the divorce is final, a friend hooks up Reba with her old college boyfriend.

programme.desc: Cheyenne signs her and Van up for Lamaze class; Reba gets into an argument with Brock when she encounters him and Barbra Jean in a childbirth class.

programme.desc: Reba ends up doing most of the work for Van's job when she insists they pay for a car given to him by Brock.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Barbra Jean begins childbirth, Reba searches the wilderness for the camping father-to-be, Brock.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Pregnant Cheyenne believes she won the title of prom queen only because of Van's popularity, so she refuses to go; Reba and Brock react to a high-school student who asks Kyra to the prom.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Leah's 30th birthday is on Christmas Eve, the same day as her brother's wedding. Her childhood crush is back in town for the ceremony and he's determined to make sure her special day doesn't go by the wayside.

programme.title: Christmas Land
programme.desc: After inheriting a Christmas tree farm, a woman's plans to sell it change when she falls in love with the townspeople and meets a charming lawyer named Tucker.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: A Very Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: A local champion skier and Vermont brew master teams up with an unlikely match to create a seasonal microbrew to save her family's business before Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas With Holly
programme.desc: The owner (Eloise Mumford) of a toy store falls in love with a man (Sean Faris) who cares for his orphaned niece.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: An archeologist and her ex-husband, an expert in ancient Norse languages, are sent to Iceland at Christmastime to search for the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: Villa Amore
programme.desc: Liara goes to Italy and impulsively buys the villa where her parents met. She soon learns she is in way over her head and must ask a lawyer-turned-handyman to help her renovate.

programme.desc: Blanche must have a pacemaker implanted and worries that it will affect her sex life.

programme.desc: A young man claims to be the illegitimate son of Blanche's late husband.

programme.desc: Rose must test for AIDS following the revelation that she may have received a tainted transfusion.

programme.desc: When Brock spends a night in Jake's treehouse, Reba finds herself babysitting her ex-husband's newborn.

programme.desc: Reba's children carouse at Brock and Barbra Jean's place; Cheyenne and Van commiserate with each other about the baby.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Just when Reba thinks things are getting back to normal, the Montgomery family is forced to move back in.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: A Machu Picchu Proposal
programme.desc: Katie helps plan her brother's proposal atop Machu Picchu. When the proposal is ruined by spontaneous Chef Carlos, Katie enlists Carlos to help her find the most romantic spot in all of Peru.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.
